content.rendered:
TOP FASHION BLOGGER SUMMER TRENDS

Summer is around the corner and I want to share some of my favorite top fashion blogger Summer trends. The look I’m loving is the metallics trend that always makes it’s way to just about every season. I’m adding my metallics inspired looks with cool girl vibe accessories like the Isabel Marant earrings, necklace, and Isabel Marant silver waist bag. I’m also shopping for edgy date night shoes like these Balenciaga boots perfect for Spring and Summer nights. These boots I think will transition beautifully from Summer to Fall. At the moment they are for pre-orders only. Be sure to purchase these asap because the might sell out fast! I’m also investing in quality vintage and designer t-shirts like this cool Balmain t-shirt with added detail on the shoulder. These kind of t-shirts are such a great investment because they can last you forever and are always in style. Pair them with your favorite skinny jeans or leather pants. I can’t leave the house without my matte D’Lashes lipstick and a classic watch…think Meghan Markle style. Stay tuned for another blog post this month heading into Father’s Day.

LOVE DIONNE
